item.title: Ease of Use Makes Money and Saves Money
item.description: Lawrence Najjar provides a bibliography of literature to help you make the ROI argument for investing in ease of use. http://www.tandemseven.com/insights/blog/details/41/

item.title: Adaptive Path ROI Report Offered for Free
item.description: Adaptive Path release Janice Fraser and Scott Hirsch's research on the ties between business value and user experience. “Leveraging Business Value: How ROI Changes User Experience” originally cost $395, but is now being offered for free. Download the report (412K PDF) http://www.adaptivepath.com/blog/2008/09/22/is-your-organization-experienced/
